description: Try our easy to follow Beef Pot Roast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef Pot Roast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g green vegetables, steamed, halved diagonally (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 150Â°C. Heat oil in a deep flameproof casserole over medium heat. Add the onion, potato and carrot and cook, stirring often, for 10 minutes or until browned. Add stock and bring to the boil. Place beef roast over vegetables. Cover with foil and a tight-fitting lid.

Transfer to oven and roast for 11/2 hours. Remove lid and foil and stir. Re-cover and return to oven for a further 1 hour or until vegetables and beef are very tender. Transfer beef and vegetables to a large platter. Cover with foil to keep warm. Strain cooking liquid into a jug.

Place casserole over medium heat. Add butter and stir for 1 minute or until melted. Add flour and stir until well combined. Cook for 1 minute. Slowly add reserved cooking liquid, whisking constantly until smooth. Bring mixture to the boil and cook for 3 minutes or until thickened. Slice beef and serve with vegetables, steamed greens and gravy.
